function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to natural spaces due to mobility restrictions affecting vulnerable individuals' psychological health","Impact":"Negative impact on psychological health due to lack of access to natural environments during the lockdown","Mitigation":"Provide alternative green spaces or promote indoor green activities to mitigate the impact","Technologies":"Virtual reality experiences, indoor gardening technologies","People":"Vulnerable individuals and communities","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations"},{"Description":"Preventing outdoor activities for children during home confinement leading to physical and psychological disorders","Impact":"Physical and psychological disorders in children, including sleep disturbance, boredom, and anxiety","Mitigation":"Promote safe outdoor activities within the home environment, encourage indoor green activities to alleviate psychological issues","Technologies":"Educational apps for indoor activities, home gardening kits","People":"Children, parents, caregivers","Owner":"Parents, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Banned access to public green spaces affecting the physical and psychological well-being of the elderly","Impact":"Negative impact on physical and psychological health of the elderly due to lack of access to green spaces and limited exercise","Mitigation":"Provide safe outdoor exercise options or promote indoor green activities for the elderly","Technologies":"Elderly-friendly exercise equipment, indoor gardening technologies","People":"Elderly individuals","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations"}]}
